notes: Interrupts the caster's channeling abilities upon cast. Meepo Clones cannot cast Mend.
Mend first applies the heal within 1200 radius, then applies a basic dispel on the caster.
Affects every allied unit, including illusions, invulnerable units and hidden units, excluding wards and buildings.

Does not heal units that have been healed by Mend in the last 39 seconds, or Restore in the last 49 seconds. Only the heal is restricted. The mana restore has no stack limit and always works. A status buff icon on affected units shows how much time is left for it to be able to get affected by the aforementioned abilities again. The heal stack limit duration is set upon cast and is unaffected by cooldown manipulation.
Only the heal is restricted. The mana restore has no stack limit and always works.
A status buff icon on affected units shows how much time is left for it to be able to get affected by the aforementioned abilities again.
The heal stack limit duration is set upon cast and is unaffected by cooldown manipulation.
abilities.description: Restores 350 health and 200 mana to nearby allies, and removes most negative effects from the caster.

notes: Multiple instances of Guardian Aura do not stack. Fully stacks with other sources of Headdress-based items' health regeneration aura. Fully stacks with other sources of Buckler-based items' armor aura.
Fully stacks with other sources of Headdress-based items' health regeneration aura.
Fully stacks with other sources of Buckler-based items' armor aura.
The boost only affects heroes (including illusions). Non-hero units only benefit from the base values.
Can regenerate up to 150 (960 while boosted) health in one minute.
Does not affect wards, buildings and invulnerable units.
The aura's buff lingers for 0.5 seconds.
abilities.description: Provides 2.5 health regeneration and 3 armor to allied units. If an allied hero's health falls below 25%, they receive 16 health regeneration and 10 armor.

additionalInformation: With Guardian Aura, the item grants a total of 7 armor to the wielder.
Movement speed bonuses from multiple pairs of Boots of Speed-based items do not stack.
Stacks with all other movement speed bonus.
name: Guardian Greaves
description: One of many holy instruments constructed to honor the Omniscience.
tips: Rearm can refresh Greaves as well, offering high mana return for Tinker himself and the heal for heroes that are not having the Mend buff.
